text:
The police on Sunday arrested Karthick on charges of attacking Arivalagan, a Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi functionary, at Vazhapadi here. Arivalagan sustained injuries and was admitted to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.

Arrested

The police on Sunday arrested Karthick (22), a labourer, on charges of sexually assaulting a seven-year-old girl. The incident occurred when the girl’s parents went out for work.

The girl raised alarm following which neighbours rushed to the home and rescued her. Karthick fled from the scene. Based on a complaint, the Magudanchavadi police registered a case under Sections 9 (m) and 10 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012 and arrested Karthick. Later, he was lodged at prison.
title: Youth held
